CREDENTIALS_INVALID.DESCRIPTION: Failed to recover auth entity with received credentials.

KEY_INVALID.DESCRIPTION: Failed to check auth entity with received key.

KEY_INVALID_LAST.DESCRIPTION: Failed to check auth entity with received key. One attempt remaining.

MESSAGE_INVALID.DESCRIPTION: Failed to check the validity of the message.

AUTH_ENTITY_BLOCKED.DESCRIPTION: Failed to check auth entity with received key too many times. Auth entity is blocked.

EMAIL_NOT_RECOVERED.DESCRIPTION: Failed to recover email from database. Unable to check if taken.

EMAIL_NOT_AVAILABLE.DESCRIPTION: Email for sign in already taken.

NICKNAME_NOT_RECOVERED.DESCRIPTION: Failed to recover nickname from database. Unable to check if taken.

NICKNAME_NOT_AVAILABLE.DESCRIPTION: Nickname for sign in already taken.

ID_NOT_RECOVERED.DESCRIPTION: Failed to recover id from database. Unable to check if taken.

AUTH_ENTITY_NOT_RECOVERED.DESCRIPTION: Failed to recover auth entity from database. Unable to check if exists.

AUTH_ENTITY_NOT_SAVED.DESCRIPTION: Failed to save auth entity in database.

AUTH_ENTITY_NOT_UPDATED.DESCRIPTION: Failed to update auth entity in database.

AUTH_ENTITY_NOT_DELETED.DESCRIPTION: Failed to delete auth entity in database.

EMAIL_NOT_SENT.DESCRIPTION: Failed to send email with temporary password.
